thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com | 4 of 168
thread.title: Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text: Approximately three months ago, I bought prescription glasses from an eye doctor and they were expensive at regular price. It would have come out to a total of $700 if I bought them at regular price (luckily I had a discount at the moment). I lost those glasses two months after buying them and I was furious. I did not want to purchase the glasses from the same eye doctor due to cost. SmartBuyGlasses is very INEXPENSIVE in comparison to the first vendor. They were also very QUICK in delivery. They even gave me a new case! Their website is also very easy to navigate. I definitely would shop here again. They're awesome.
